text: “onna ooka thamayi chuti babo mama kiyanne kawadawath igillennanam epa kiyala“
pol kadima ha wenath edineda kuli wada kota jiwikawa gena yana halawatha mahawawa pradeshaye kamkaruwek prakasha kale pasugiya sathi dekaka pamana kalayak kisima kuli wadak no labuna bawayi.
mahapala swamin wahanse thama sirurath samanga oya kathabaha kota nimawa wadiwelama as beheth damma.

eya da sandahan kerenne, 'jathikawadaya' yanna artha ganwena aakarayata ya.meya kiyamanak awabhawithayata lak kerena andabalayan ge kriyawak lesa sandahan karanu kamaththemi.uktha kiyamanata sambandha wa yuropayedi sidu wunu athitha siduwimak thibe.
radolfta siya das adahagatha nohaki wa edesa bala sitiye ya.

mita amatharawa jathika kongrasaya, ee.pi.ngi.pi. sanwidhanaya, lanka kamkaru kongrasaya, ti.em.wi.pi. hewath damila mahajana wimukthi sanwidhanaya, parlimenthu manthri athuraliye rathana himiyan nayakathwaya darana  wijayadharani jathika sabhawa, pragathishili damila pakshaya, shri lanka mahajana pakshaya, deshawimukthi janatha pakshaya, eksath mahajana pakshaya mema giwisumata athsan karanu labuwa.anathuruwa gotabhaya rajapaksha pramukha paksha nayakayin wisin prathignyawak da sidukaranu labuwa.
boho himiyan eya waya kalath, me nithigaruka piyawara maga harimata hora parak athdayi mudal thanhawen pepanu samahara karmanthakaruwan wiparam kala.

budu hamuduruwo ek wishesha deshanawakadi thamange dharmaya kelinma upakaranayakata nathnam aadharakayakata samana karanawa – “mahaneni mama mage dharmaya pahurakata upama karanawa, ee pahura pawichchi karala egoda wima sandahayi.
